statements: SELECT * FROM NuclearEnergyDatabase
SELECT sensitive_data FROM NuclearEnergyDatabase
SELECT id, sensitive_data FROM NuclearEnergyDatabase WHERE id = 1
SELECT * FROM NuclearEnergyDatabase ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM NuclearEnergyDatabase WHERE sensitive_data = 'top secret'
SELECT id, sensitive_data FROM NuclearEnergyDatabase WHERE id = 1;
SELECT sensitive_data, encryption_key FROM NuclearEnergyDatabase WHERE sensitive_data LIKE '%reactor%';
SELECT * FROM NuclearEnergyDatabase ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, encryption_key FROM NuclearEnergyDatabase WHERE sensitive_data IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM NuclearEnergyDatabase WHERE encryption_key = 'secure_key123';
SELECT * FROM nuclear_energy_security_audit;
SELECT id, auditor_name, audit_date FROM nuclear_energy_security_audit ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM nuclear_energy_security_audit WHERE auditor_name='John Doe';
SELECT * FROM nuclear_energy_security_audit WHERE id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT DISTINCT auditor_name FROM nuclear_energy_security_audit;
SELECT * FROM nuclear_energy_security_audit WHERE auditor_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT id, audit_date FROM nuclear_energy_security_audit WHERE audit_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM nuclear_energy_security_audit ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT auditor_name, findings FROM nuclear_energy_security_audit WHERE findings LIKE '%security%';
SELECT id, auditor_name, findings FROM nuclear_energy_security_audit WHERE auditor_name = 'Alice Johnson' AND audit_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM nuclear_energy_database_administrators;
SELECT id, full_name, role FROM nuclear_energy_database_administrators WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT audit_id, audit_date, status FROM security_audits ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT key_name, key_value, created_by FROM encryption_keys WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT full_name, email FROM nuclear_energy_database_administrators WHERE email LIKE '%example.com';
SELECT * FROM nuclear_energy_database_administrators;
SELECT id, full_name FROM nuclear_energy_database_administrators WHERE role='Admin';
SELECT audit_id, auditor_name, audit_date FROM security_audits ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT key_id, key_name, created_by FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_value IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM nuclear_energy_database_administrators UNION SELECT * FROM security_audits;
SELECT * FROM SecurityAudit;
SELECT audit_date, auditor_name FROM SecurityAudit WHERE audit_result = 'Passed';
SELECT facility_name, facility_location FROM NuclearFacility ORDER BY facility_location ASC;
SELECT * FROM SensitiveInformation WHERE info_encrypted = TRUE;
SELECT encryption_type, encryption_key FROM Encryption WHERE encryption_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM SecurityAudit WHERE audit_result='Passed';
SELECT facility_name, facility_location FROM NuclearFacility WHERE facility_status='Active';
SELECT info_type, info_description FROM SensitiveInformation WHERE info_encrypted=true;
SELECT encryption_type, encryption_key FROM Encryption;
SELECT auditor_name, audit_date FROM SecurityAudit ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Nuclear_Users;
SELECT username, role FROM Nuclear_Users WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT employee_name, department, salary FROM Nuclear_Employee_Details ORDER BY salary DESC;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, action, username FROM Nuclear_Audit_Logs JOIN Nuclear_Users ON Nuclear_Audit_Logs.user_id = Nuclear_Users.user_id;
SELECT info_description FROM Nuclear_Sensitive_Info WHERE encryption_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Nuclear_Users WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM Nuclear_Employee_Details GROUP BY department;
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM Nuclear_Audit_Logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT e.employee_name, e.department, e.salary, i.info_description FROM Nuclear_Employee_Details e INNER JOIN Nuclear_Sensitive_Info i ON e.employee_id = i.info_id;
SELECT * FROM Nuclear_Data_Encryption WHERE algorithm = 'AES' ORDER BY encryption_id DESC;
